title: The Herd-HOUR-3-Kawhiet Production, Rapid Testing, Best For Last
itunes:title: The Herd-HOUR-3-Kawhiet Production, Rapid Testing, Best For Last
description:
In this hour of The Herd with Colin Cowherd, Doug Gottlieb--in for Colin--makes the case for Clippers' small forward Kawhi Leonard as the best player in the NBA--and he has the numbers to back it up. Also, college football writer and analyst Bruce Feldman of The Athletic and FOX Sports joins the show to discuss the Pac-12's new Covid-19 testing regimen and how it could bring college football back earlier than previously stated.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
